wikitext.*:
'''Lode Claes''' ([[1931]] - [[14 March]] [[2019]]) was a Belgian artist who created fine line color scene pictures based on Lord of the Rings.<ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://www.nieuwsblad.be/cnt/blrbi_20120416_001|articlename=Tentoonstelling grafische werken van Lode Claes|dated=2012|author=Raymond Billen|website=[https://www.nieuwsblad.be Het Nieuwsblad]}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://www.hln.be/tienen/afscheid-van-kunstenaar-lode-claes-88~a9f766b7/|articlename=Afscheid van kunstenaar Lode Claes (88)|dated=2019|author=Vdt|website=[https://www.hln.be/ Het Laatste Nieuws]}}</ref> His work was featured in various exhibitions in Belgium, the USA (Milwaukee, WI), the [[Tolkien Calendar 1998|1998 Tolkien calendar]], [[The Lord of the Rings: A Book of 20 Postcards]] and [[Realms of Tolkien]]. His art was owned by [[Priscilla Tolkien]]. Lode Claes was a close personal friend of [[Jan Boom]].
